Dead by Daylight ist für all die weiterzuempfehlen, die nicht nur Taktik sondern auch Spannung, Nervenkitzel und sogar etwas Horror lieben. Das Game-Design ist super und das Spiel ist erstaunlich gut gebalanced, sodass Killer als auch Survivor die selben Chancen haben zu gewinnen.

One of the few games I really enjoy sitting down and playing for long periods. There's a sense of suspense as you face the killer, but also in the capabilities of your random teammates.
Got 1000 hours on the game at the time of writing this. Its pretty fun, aside from some of the toxies that play this game.
De lo mejor para jugar con amigos

Mimo że gra odnotowała największe wyniki od początku istnienia, to mimo wszystko obawiam się że za długo nie pociągnie. Reworki wizualne map nie były najlepszym pomysłem. "Poprawa" graficzna nie idzie w parze z optymalizacją. System Bloodweb potrzebuje generalnej naprawy, gra posiada wiele błędów, ale te na szczęście zamiast denerwować to bawią community. Najnowsza opcja wykorzystania kodów na moment aktualny nie ma najmniejszego sensu, skoro jedyne co twórcy dają to BLOODPOINTS'y które tak czy tak zdobywam grając. Gra w tym momencie polega na Grindowaniu postaci, co po wielu godzinach może się okazać monotonne. Podsumowując - wszystko o czym napisałem jest zauważalne w momencie kiedy już spędzisz kilkaset godzin. Nie chcę odradzać zakupu tej gry. Nie mam zamiaru odejść od niej, ponieważ ma coś w sobie czego nie ma praktycznie żadna gra, czyli Community, które jest jedyne w swoim rodzaju! <3

I've been hyped for this game ever since I saw a let's play of it shortly after it's release, but sadly was only able to purchase it two years later after getting a better computer and I must say that I am still very much in love with this game -  especially since I can play it myself. The developers really put all their efforts into pushing the game forward constantly and YES there might be bugs that aren't fixed in a long time, but honestly, those bugs are usually not game breaking bugs for non-competible players, so it really isn't as much of a deal as it sounds like most of the time (you know how it is, complaining people often have the loudest voices). The community is most of the time very kind and there's always something to do. 
I must say that this game is definitely more enjoyable when you play it with friends, only one friend is already a game changer! 
But overall...it's cool! I love it and I totally recommend it if you don't know what to do in the evening and want to have some fun with your friends.
bem divertido, principalmente jogando com os amigos

After a long play time, even though there might be a bit of balancing issues, the new updates sure make it more fun to play. And with the new objectives system, makes you more compelled to do something then just generators.
Its one of the best scream survival game ive ever played, incredible and terrifying use of sound and impredictable. May be unfair sometimes but still a great game for playing with friends.

The game is pretty good if you want to play survivor with your firends.Otherwise if you want to play killer (im a killer main) you should be expecting a lot of BS. In the current state of the game if you want to be effective as a killer you should mostly play as nurse and hillbilly. Though it has its flaws, i still love the game and i recommend it when its on a discount.
Just a fun horror games to play with others or by yourself.
